fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Target a player at night, turning them into a Spiral. **This does not count as a role conversion.**
- Target a known Spiral, forcing them to target another player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only perform one ability per night.
- If a Spiral visits another target at night, their target will become a Spiral.
- If a Spiral visits another Spiral, they both deal a Powerful attack to each other.
- If a Spiral visits you the night you're attacked, the Spiral will die instead of you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see all living players become a Spiral.
